Sentencas: In this study, the thermal expansion behavior of the BSCF (Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta) and La-doped BSCF, i.e., (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(0.7)La0.3Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSLCF30) was systematically examined.
Titulo: Thermal expansion behavior of La-doped (Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2)03-δ cathode material

Sentencas: The thermal expansion rate of the sintered body increased rapidly at around 500 degrees C.
Titulo: Thermal expansion behavior of La-doped (Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2)03-δ cathode material

Sentencas: It was found from the TG analysis that the oxygen vacancies formed around this temperature.
Titulo: Thermal expansion behavior of La-doped (Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2)03-δ cathode material

Sentencas: When La is doped in the A-site of BSCF, more weight loss was observed over 500 degrees C compared to BSCF, which shows that La doping induces oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Thermal expansion behavior of La-doped (Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2)03-δ cathode material

Sentencas: Consequently, chemical expansion of the B-site cations occurred.
Titulo: Thermal expansion behavior of La-doped (Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2)03-δ cathode material

Sentencas: Therefore, the thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) of BSLCF was much bigger than that of the BSCF.
Titulo: Thermal expansion behavior of La-doped (Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2)03-δ cathode material

Sentencas: When the samples were heated and cooled in an Ar atmosphere, hysteresis of TEC was observed since re-oxidation cannot occur during cooling.
Titulo: Thermal expansion behavior of La-doped (Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2)03-δ cathode material
Thermal expansion behavior of La-doped (Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2)03-δ cathode material
